EmailTemplate.subject: Wishing you a very Happy Birthday {!Contact.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
It's time to put on your dancing shoes and party like it's your birthday, because it is! We wanted to take a moment to thank you for all your contributions to our team and for making our work environment a more enjoyable place. Today, we want you to relax, let go, and enjoy the festivities with your friends and family.
Happy birthday from all of us at Cloud Peritus. We wish you lots of love, happiness, and success in the years to come.
Regards,
The Cloud Peritus Team
